work.title: EPOCH
work.content: EPOCH needed a brand and website to launch their product. We designed their identity and built a website.

work.title: Veratrak
work.content: Veratrak, a pharmaceutical, blockchain company needed a new logo and a new website.

work.title: Boombocs
work.content: Boombocs website needed modern flurishes and a new landing page added to their existing Shopify site.

work.title: North Star Law
work.content: We refreshed their dated website into a sleek, professional one while drawing out new branding opportunities.

work.title: 3DUX Wordpress Website
work.content: For 3DUX, we created a bespoke Wordpress theme. This theme needed a login area where clients could request to see their more sensitive work.
